name: It Corporation
description:
We stand out for the excellence, efficiency and impeccability in the development of technological projects. In all the work we put special emphasis on generating a high valuation of our services, focusing on a style focused on people, which gives us quality and difference in the services of technological projects of the market and puts us in a leading position in the industry.
We develop apps and websites and offer IT outsourcing services, plus hardware and servers for companies.
